The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an abandoned missle silo with bodies all over and what seems like some sort of beast. It's clear that the beast is killing them and the search party seems to disappear one by one, so we have no real group of survivors to be interesting. Nothing much happens with the story, but
